title: General Purpose Programming
description: Proficent with or exposure to multiple general purpose programming languages including Java, C/C++, Python, JavaScript, and Scala. Well-versed in object oriented programming practices.

title: Mathematics Expertise
description: Comprehensive Mathematics education in areas both related and unrelated to Computer Science such as Calculus/Differential Equations, Linear Algebra, Probability, Discrete Mathematics, Graph Theory, and many more.

title: Web Technologies
description: Proficient with common web stack technologies such as HTML, CSS, and Javascript as well as the React, Angular, Django, and Spring frameworks.

title: Data Science
description: Proficient with or exposure to multiple common mathematics or data science programming languages including Python, SQL, MATLAB, and Scala.

title: Scripting Languages
description: Proficient with or exposure to multiple scripting techniques such as shell scripting, Python, and Javascript.

title: Operating Systems
description: Strong understanding of operating system architecture and internals. Large amount of work-related exposure to Linux and MacOS. Experience with Windows.

title: Cloud
description: Understanding of and experience with multiple AWS cloud services including Amplify, Elastic Container Registry, Elastic Container Service, Route53, EC2, and S3.
